page.title: 14Lace making <1>
page.content:
Buckingham is{famous }for its{lace. Lace-making started along time ago when it was found that land was no suitable for sheep and the wool trade.
Buckingham lace is{point d'Angelerre It was a cottage industry and became {hereditary.}Generations of Buckingham people learn to make lace.
I began lace making in February 1983 ,when a lady called{Stella Mills}asked me if I would like to try spinning fleece into wool. When I had a try Stella asked me if I would like to try lace. So I did and decided to start this hobby.
The first piece of lace I made was a piece that everyone does. By this time I had purchased a{lace pillow, bobbins and{pins.
